original_text: After this, all the Israelites came near to Moses. He told them all the commands that the Lord had given to him on Sinai mountain.
korean_text: 그 후에야 온 이스라엘 자손이 가까이 오는지라 모세가 여호와께서 시내 산에서 자기에게 이르신 말씀을 다 그들에게 명령하고

sentences.original_text: After this, all the Israelites came near to Moses.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 후에, 모든 이스라엘 사람들이 모세에게 가까이 came came came came came near.

sentences.original_text: He told them all the commands
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들에게 모든 명령을 told them.

sentences.original_text: that the Lord had given to him
